org.osmdroid.google.wrapper

Class MapView

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.osmdroid.google.wrapper.MapView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.osmdroid.api.IMapView

    public class MapView
extends Object
implements org.osmdroid.api.IMapView
    A wrapper for the Google com.google.android.maps.MapView class. This implements IMapView, which is also implemented by the osmdroid MapView.
